alert.note: Alert for Palm Beach (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 24 at 3:59PM EDT until May 24 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM EDT FOR EAST CENTRAL PALM BEACH COUNTY... At 359 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Atlantis, or over Boynton Beach, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... West Palm Beach, Boynton Beach, Delray Beach, Lake Worth and Palm Beach. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
